Name: Messier111
About the game: Messier 111 is a twin-stick shooter that will test your skills. Continue to take down enemies that are endlessly coming at you and try to survive longer. You must avoid all attacks. Getting hit means the end. Use two different shots to destroy the enemies. Survival time is everything: 30 seconds of estimated time per play to as much as you want.(depending on you!) Avoid flying bullets and enemies with tact and reflexes. One hit is fatal. There are more than 10 different types of enemies that will attack you. Gain experience orbs dropped by enemies to strengthen your ship. Quick reinforcement gives you a survival advantage. You have a buddy who can be used to follow and cover you, or place in a fixed position to use as a turret. Release the overdrive energy and wipe out enemies.
